I have a static method with the @BeforeClass annotation, and it is not bein=
g run at all before my JUnit tests. My class extends TestCase and is a JUni=
t 4 test.

I simply have:

@BeforeClass
public static void Up() {
   System=
.out.println("this should show up in the console");
}

Any ideas why this s=
houldn't be working?
